about_the_game:
Victorian Antiques Chest

In the dark recesses of a dusty attic, tucked away and forgotten, lies an old chest filled with once-beloved heirlooms and trinkets. Will you give them a new home?

Includes
  • Bee Basket
  • Mushlamp Post
  • Fanciful Pickaxe
  • Victorian Salt Box
  • Feather Trimmed Hat
  • Victorian Eyebrella
  • Victorian Meat Rack
  • Wrought Iron Fence
  • Antique Brass Fence
  • Antique Bronze Fence
  • Wrought Iron Gate
  • Antique Brass Gate
  • Antique Bronze Gate
  • Moonlit Victorian Wall
  • Victorian Thulecite Wall
  • Victorian Stone Wall

Victorian Antiques Chest

In the dark recesses of a dusty attic, tucked away and forgotten, lies an old chest filled with once-beloved heirlooms and trinkets. Will you give them a new home?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
